# PTD Today Forward Watchlist (Rest of 2026)

- Major public safety incidents and disaster responses, exemplified by the deadly Swiss ski resort fire  
- Cybersecurity and cybercrime as a growing global threat emphasizing espionage and criminal empires  
- Corporate mergers and hostile takeovers in media and entertainment sectors (e.g., Netflix and Warner Bros)

- Public safety and emergency preparedness risks underscored by the Swiss resort fire disaster

- Cybersecurity vulnerabilities amid expanding $15tn cybercrime global empire
